application.project_license: GPL-3.0+ and BSD and LGPL-2.0+ and wxWidgets
application.name: Guayadeque

description.p: Guayadeque is a music management program designed for all music enthusiasts. It is Full Featured Linux media player that can easily manage large collections and uses the Gstreamer media framework. Guayadeque is intended to be your audio program for listening to a music library, Jamendo, Magnatunes, podcasts or internet radio.
